import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/Pay.css"; function Pay() { return (

RGM Family Driver Pay

Drive for RGM Family

Apply Today

Maximize Your Earning Potential

At RGM Family, while we do offer traditional mileage pay, most of our fleet choose percentage pay. Our Performance-Based Percentage Pay Program was created by drivers who wanted their paychecks to reflect the quality and quantity of the work they performed. You don't have to run the wheels off your truck to make good money. Just focus on your performance and let the rewards come to you!

Percentage Pay

Work smarter, not harder! First-year drivers earn up to $88,000 depending on performance.

Additional Pay

  • Tarp Pay
  • Breakdown Pay
  • Referral Bonuses
  • Stop Pay
  • Toll & Scale Passes
  • Detention Pay
  • Borough Pay
  • Tuition Reimbursement
  • Over-Dimensional Load Pay
  • Vacation Pay
  • Sign-On Bonuses

Drive It Like You Own It.

Apply Now
); } export default Pay;
